mapper.select: SELECT id, title, ST_AsGeoJSON(center_point) AS center_geojson, ST_AsGeoJSON(edge_points) AS polygon_geojson FROM tour_location ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT id, title, ST_AsGeoJSON(center_point) AS center_geojson, ST_AsGeoJSON(edge_points) AS polygon_geojson FROM tour_location WHERE id = #{id} LIMIT 1

SELECT tl.id AS location_id, tl.title, EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM photo p WHERE p.user_id = #{userId} AND p.location_id = tl.id /* AND p.status = 'COMPLETED' */ LIMIT 1 ) AS uploaded FROM tour_location tl ORDER BY tl.id ASC
